entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: SSE 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
